summary: The Abandoned Shelter is located North-East of Whiterun and is just across the road from the Battle-Born farm.  It makes a great player starter home and is follower friendly.  It can be fast traveled to immediately and has plenty of safe storage.
descriptionHtml:
Abandoned Shelter v1.2

This mod is update safe.  If you update just copy TheNewShack.esp over your existing one.  Anything you have in storage is safe.


The Abandoned Shelter is located North-East of Whiterun and is just across the road from the Battle-Born farm.  It makes a great player starter home and is follower friendly.  It can be fast traveled to immediately and has plenty of safe storage.  It also has every crafting station and many items to make starting over less of a grind.  Also included is a chest which contains items with almost every enchant in the game which can be disenchanted to make enchanting your personal items less of a chore.  Last but not least there is armor, weapons, ingredients, lockpicks, gold etc to give you a bit of a head start but there are no God Items.  

Read below for more information.  


FEATURES:
- Anvil
- Alchemy Table
- Enchanting Table
- Cooking Spit
- Tanning Rack
- Workbench
- Grinding Stone
- Daedric armor and weapons
- Some ingredients
- Some spell tomes
- Some smithing potions
- 100 lockpicks
- 7,500 gold
- A collection of enchanted rings and amulets with almost all armor enchantments.

Requirements:

This mod does not require any DLC or any other mods.


Install:

Just copy TheNewShack.esp into your SkyrimData folder.


Uninstall:

Just delete TheNewShack.esp from your SkyrimData folder.


Update Info v1.2:

- Removed rock from exterior
- Added Shrine of Talos
- Added a couple of satchels for storage
- Added an empty barrel for storage
- cleaned with TES5Edit

Update Info v1.1:

- New farmhouse
- Added anvil and grinding stone
- Added exterior lighting
- Changed interior slightly
- Minor changes to interior and exterior navmesh
author: SuperMegaSuperMega
